name: 2D Space Shooter
description:
This is a generic 2d space action-rpg game. The player’s ultimate goal is eliminate all the aliens and safe the galaxy.

What’s done so far:

– 12 types of enemies

– 3 types of bosses

– 3 types of weapons

– 3 types of power-ups

What’s next:

– Open world

– Randomly-generated side quests

– Boarding and capture enemies’ ships

– More enemies, weapons, power-ups, etc.

Any feedback is totally welcome.
